scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Family on a journey, with the Virgin Mary seated on a donkey, holding the Christ Child swaddled in red. Saint Joseph, with a white beard and wearing a blue hood and red robe, walks beside the donkey, holding a staff. They are set against a background of stylized trees and a blue sky, within a decorative border. This imagery represents the Flight into Egypt, a significant event in the early life of Jesus.
